name: Mountain Climber (ShudderPig)
description:
Instructions

click on a tile to select it.

when a tile is selected you can click the buttons jump or bounce to place a tile down.

to rotate the  bounce tile click and drag the red dot.

click run and your climber will try to get to the top of the mountain.

click restart to restart the run.

get to the top of the mountain (flag) to win!

Have fun
